structure.unit: LEVY AND ASSESSMENT OF PROPERTY TAXES

law.catch_line: Office facilities for property valuation administrator -- Records -- Working hours.

text.section: The fiscal court of each county shall provide for the property valuation administrator a suitable office room or rooms in the county courthouse, or when that is not practicable, in some other building at the county seat, together with suitable furniture. In that office shall be safely kept the books, maps, taxpayers' lists, papers and all other records pertaining to the assessment of property within the county, except when such records are required by law to be placed in the custody of other officers.
The property valuation administrator shall engage in official duties at least five (5) days a week during regular working hours and shall keep scheduled office hours at least five (5) days each week.
